uniqueMapList["The Vinktar Square"] := "Map is a large square. Each corner has a guardian named after a cardinal direction.`nAfter all guardians are killed, a gate in the center of the map will open, leading to the Avatar of Thunder.`nThis boss has four phases (25% HP) and spawns the encountered guardians again in between.`nAll guardians and the boss deal lightning damage and have burst skills that you need to run away from.`nThe final boss always drops one 'Vessel of Vinktar', which has four variants.`nDifficulty: 4/5"
